      • run

        public void run(java.net.URL rootUrl,
       java.lang.String userDirectory)
         throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                java.io.IOException,
                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Runs the crawler. Adds a url to a queue and strips any http link from that page, adding them to the queue. Every 5 seconds it repeats using the url from the top of the queue.
        Parameters:
        rootUrl -
        userDirectory -
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.InterruptedException
